about.title: The Riviera story
about.p1: Riviera Baku sits on the Caspian shore, blending the city’s rhythm with the calm of the sea. With Restaurant, Lounge and Park concepts, it is ideal for both romantic dinners and gatherings with friends.
about.p2: Author’s cuisine, a curated wine menu, and live music in the lounge create experiences for every taste. The open-air park zone is designed for unwinding to the sound of the sea.
about.featKitchenText: Selected produce, delicate presentation and a menu tuned to the sea view.
about.featPhilosophyText: Personal approach for every guest, attentive service and comfort.
about.featAtmosText: A unified Riviera mood across Restaurant, Lounge and Park.
about.cardText: Riviera Baku unites Restaurant, Lounge and Park concepts. Contact us for private events and tailored group menus.
